overview.archetype: AoE HP Burn / Debuff Specialist / Soloist

gear_tradeoffs.pros: Extra turns for more burns and debuffs
Sustain for soloing and hard content

a1.name: Chaosrazor
a1.notes: Attacks all enemies. 35% chance to extend [HP Burn] debuffs by 1 turn.

a2.name: Dogs Of War
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies. Instantly activates [HP Burn] debuffs. 75% chance to place 50% [Decrease ATK] for 2 turns.

a3.name: Purifyre
a3.notes: Attacks all enemies 2 times. First hit: 75% chance to place [HP Burn] for 2 turns. Restores destroyed MAX HP by 10% for each [HP Burn] placed. Heals by 5% MAX HP for each [HP Burn] attempt blocked or resisted.

passive.impact: Whenever a [HP Burn] is activated, destroys this championâ€™s MAX HP by 5% (up to 50%). Increases DMG, C.DMG, DEF by 1% and SPD, RES by 2 for each 1% destroyed MAX HP.

booking.notes: A2 and A3 gain significant cooldown reduction and effect chance.

rotation.average_damage: High for HP Burn teams, moderate direct damage

scenarios.notes: Procs on AoE hits, boosting burn and direct damage.
Focus on survivability and resistance for soloing.

clan_boss.notes: Excels in Hydra and Spider, strong in CB with proper support.

synergy.relentless_viability: High for PvE, can disrupt strict speed tunes in CB/Arena.

investment.notes: Top-tier free legendary for HP Burn, soloing, and debuffing. Books are a great investment.

owned_comparison.comparison: Drexthar is a strong HP Burner but less versatile.
Akoth offers HP Burn but less healing and utility.

draft_logic.notes: Early pick for HP Burn teams, counter-pick vs high HP bosses.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Can reduce cooldowns for more frequent burns.
gear_set_stability.Relentless: Extra turns can desync team but increase burn uptime.
gear_set_stability.Savage: Not recommended, as Artak is not a nuker.

utility_comparison.comparison: Drexthar is tankier but less self-sustaining.
Akoth is easier to build but less healing.
Fayne offers more debuffs but less AoE control.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Warmaster for PvE, Unshakeable for solo/defense
final_summary.damage_rotation: A3 for HP Burn, A2 for activation, A1 for extension
final_summary.turn_meter_stability: Stable with Regeneration/Immortal, variable with Relentless
final_summary.passive_impact: Burning Blood boosts stats but reduces MAX HP, requires healing/restore.
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize HP%, SPD, ACC. Regeneration/Immortal for solo, Relentless for PvE.
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Excellent with other HP Burners and healers.
final_summary.relentless_viability: High for PvE, avoid in strict speed tunes.

team_setups.name: HP Burn Hydra
team_setups.strategy: Stack HP Burn, heal, and activate burns for max boss damage.

team_setups.name: Solo Dungeon
team_setups.strategy: Artak solos with Regeneration/Immortal, Scyl revives if needed.
